name: Pocket Panzers
description: Pocket Panzers is my first multiplayer game, powered by Photon PUN. You need at least 2 people to play a match together. The game is a 2D turn based artillery game. In each round, you get an increasing amount of money to spend on shells. You control the launch impulse and angle of your tank, and to a limited extent the movement of your tank. The goal of each match is to be the last tank standing after killing all others with your shells.
